docs.lead_paragraph: Through sickness and in health, Scrabble served as the backdrop for the relationship of Matthew Danzig and Elisabeth Hall.

headline.seo: Scrabble Launched the Relationship for Matthew Danzig and Elisabeth Hall
headline.main: Couple Played the Tiles They Were Dealt
